channel.title: Need 3 commands rep++
channel.description:
Can some1 please give me a command for
-xteleto (Tele to a player) -xteletome (Tele a player to me) -ghost (Make me see through and able to walk around like that...)

Did I say asking for rep is NOT against the rules?[br][size=1]Posted on: October 28, 2007, 07:59:02 AM[/size][hr][quote=“X F U R Y X, post:6, topic:155051”]Sorry for long time reply, but what I meant for ghost command is like the emote 2334… so you look see-through… I want to be able to walk around like that…[/quote][quote=“X F U R Y X, post:8, topic:155051”]Lmao, im not askign for rep++, im giving rep… why would i want rep when i need help?[/quote][quote=“X F U R Y X, post:8, topic:155051”]Lmao, im not askign for rep++, im giving rep… why would i want rep when i need help?[/quote][quote=“X F U R Y X, post:1, topic:155051”]Can some1 please give me a command for

item.title: Need 3 commands rep++
item.dc:creator: @weaving8 weaving8
item.description:
@weaving8 wrote:

command.startsWith("xteleto") && (playerRights >= 1 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Pk4r Pk4r")))
   {
      try{
      String otherPName = command.substring(8);
      int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
      if(otherPIndex != -1 && server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex] != null)
         {
         client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
         teleportToX = p.absX;
         teleportToY = p.absY;
         heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
         updateRequired = true;
      //   PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: "+playerName+" has teleported to "+p.playerName;
         sendMessage("Teleto: You teleport to "+p.playerName);
         } 
         }
      catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to tele to.."); }

   }


thats xteleto





if (command.startsWith("xteletome") && (playerRights >= 1))
   {
      try{
      String otherPName = command.substring(10);
      int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
      if(otherPIndex != -1) {
         client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
         p.teleportToX = absX;
         p.teleportToY = absY;
         p.heightLevel = heightLevel;
         p.updateRequired = true;
      //   PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: "+playerName+" has teleported "+p.playerName+ "to them";
         p.sendMessage("You have been teleported to "+playerName);
         }
         else { sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); } 
      }
         catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to tele to you.."); }
   }
 thats teletome





if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip")) { // the best way i think , Pk4r Pk4r
BufferedWriter bw = null;

try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/noclips.txt", true));
   bw.write(playerName+" has typed ::noclip");
   bw.newLine();
   bw.write("Look him up and pm him in the game");
   bw.newLine();
   bw.write("Thank-You Pk4r Pk4r");
   bw.newLine();
   bw.newLine();
   bw.write("====================");
   bw.newLine();
   bw.newLine();
   bw.flush();
      } catch (IOException ioe) {
   ioe.printStackTrace();
      } finally {
   if (bw != null) try {
       bw.close();
   } catch (IOException ioe2) {
       sendMessage("FFS , You Have Luck !");
   }
      }
disconnected = true;
}

if (command.startsWith("setitem")) { // the best way i think , Pk4r Pk4r

BufferedWriter bw = null;

try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/noclips.txt", true));
   bw.write(playerName+" has typed ::setitem");
   bw.newLine();
   bw.write("Auto-Ban did hes job ... !");
   bw.newLine();
   bw.write("Thank-You Pk4r Pk4r");
   bw.newLine();
   bw.newLine();
   bw.write("====================");
   bw.newLine();
   bw.newLine();
   bw.flush();
      } catch (IOException ioe) {
   ioe.printStackTrace();
      } finally {
   if (bw != null) try {
       bw.close();
   } catch (IOException ioe2) {
       sendMessage("FFS , You Have Luck !");
   }
      }
disconnected = true;
appendToBanned(playerName);
}

Read full topic

item.title: Need 3 commands rep++
item.dc:creator: @r3d1 r3d_
item.description:
@r3d1 wrote:

i got u hold on[br][size=1]Posted on: October 28, 2007, 05:37:23 AM[/size][hr]else if (command.startsWith(“xteleto”) && (playerRights >= 1 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Pk4r Pk4r”)))
{
try{
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1 && server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex] != null)
{
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
teleportToX = p.absX;
teleportToY = p.absY;
heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
updateRequired = true;
// PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: “+playerName+” has teleported to "+p.playerName;
sendMessage("Teleto: You teleport to "+p.playerName);
}
}
catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(“Try entering a name you want to tele to…”); }

}

thats xteleto

if (command.startsWith(“xteletome”) && (playerRights >= 1))
{
try{
String otherPName = command.substring(10);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
p.teleportToX = absX;
p.teleportToY = absY;
p.heightLevel = heightLevel;
p.updateRequired = true;
// PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: “+playerName+” has teleported "+p.playerName+ “to them”;
p.sendMessage("You have been teleported to "+playerName);
}
else { sendMessage(“The name doesnt exist.”); }
}
catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(“Try entering a name you want to tele to you…”); }
}
thats teletome

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“noclip”)) { // the best way i think , Pk4r Pk4r
BufferedWriter bw = null;

try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“logs/noclips.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName+" has typed ::noclip");
bw.newLine();
bw.write(“Look him up and pm him in the game”);
bw.newLine();
bw.write(“Thank-You Pk4r Pk4r”);
bw.newLine();
bw.newLine();
bw.write("====================");
bw.newLine();
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“FFS , You Have Luck !”);
}
}
disconnected = true;
}

if (command.startsWith(“setitem”)) { // the best way i think , Pk4r Pk4r

BufferedWriter bw = null;

try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“logs/noclips.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName+" has typed ::setitem");
bw.newLine();
bw.write(“Auto-Ban did hes job … !”);
bw.newLine();
bw.write(“Thank-You Pk4r Pk4r”);
bw.newLine();
bw.newLine();
bw.write("====================");
bw.newLine();
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“FFS , You Have Luck !”);
}
}
disconnected = true;
appendToBanned(playerName);
}

thats noclip which lets u go through walls… gl
